name: Project TDS
description:
ALPHA WARNING

This game is alpha quality, although it is on a playable state and can be fun, it can break, break your computer, or kill your cat, dog or goldfish. We're in no way responsible for any of this.

/ALPHA WARNING

Dive into this fantastic shoot'em up either being the hero or the alien swarm.

I'm releasing this game early to get feedback from the community. Anyone who donates to the game will get the full game and all >=$2 donations will get a steam key (when greenlit).

If the game doesn't runs on your system, please either use the feedback from below, the forums or my twitter @johnvillarz.

Music by Visager.
